lines.text: If I was a man I'd have nothing to do with me.
Would you like a glass of water?
Why, do you want to soak your feet?
Barry, remember what the doctor told you!
The doctor told me not to dance. I'm not gonna dance.
Oh, you English. When will you learn that love is a souffle, not a pudding?
Look, I'm not a potato! I'm a man you're supposed to be in love with.
I wish you were a potato! I'm hungry.
